rules: Rule1: If technology1 was invented by person3, then it is adopted in region3.
Rule2: Whenever technology1 is funded by person4, it becomes adopted in region2.
Rule3: Provided that technology1 is tested in natural_place2, if it is not successful, then it fails.
Rule4: Technology1 is tested in natural_place2 or technology1 is tested in natural_place3.
Rule5: Either person5 approves technology1 or person6 approves technology1.
Rule6: In the event that person6 approves technology1, if technology1 is tested in natural_place3 and is not successful, then it fails.
Rule7: Technology1 is located in region1, or it is not the case that person1 invented technology1.
Rule8: Whenever technology1 is discovered in natural_place1, it is manufactured in natural_place1.
Rule9: If technology1 is discovered in natural_place1, then it is not manufactured in natural_place1.
Rule10: Either technology1 is discovered in natural_place1, or if it is located in region1, then it is popular in time_period1.
Rule11: Whenever technology1 is successful, it is profitable.
Rule12: If technology1 is adopted in region2, then it is successful.
Rule13: In the case that technology1 is adopted in region3, it is successful.
Rule14: If technology1 is invented by person2, then it is funded by person4.
Rule15: Either technology1 is invented by person2 or technology1 is invented by person3.
Rule16: If it is not the case that the approval by person5 implies that testing in natural_place3 and lack of success leads to failure, then technology1 is banned.
Rule17: If technology1 is not successful, then it does not fail.
Rule18: Under the condition that technology1 is not profitable, person1 invented technology1.
facts: Fact2: Technology1 is not popular in time_period1.
